benchmark_details.name: MixEval
benchmark_details.overview: MixEval is a new paradigm for establishing efficient, gold-standard large language model (LLM) evaluation by strategically mixing off-the-shelf benchmarks. It bridges comprehensive real-world user queries with efficient and fairly-graded ground-truth-based benchmarks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide an efficient and effective benchmark for evaluating large language models (LLMs) that aligns closely with real-world user queries and preferences.

data.source: Web queries mined from Common Crawl and matched with existing benchmarks.
data.annotation: Automatically filtered and categorized using open-source LLMs.

methodology.calculation: Correlation is calculated between model scores and Chatbot Arena Elo scores.
methodology.interpretation: Higher correlation indicates better agreement with human preferences.
methodology.validation: Stability tests show low standard deviation in model scores across versions.
